title: Whoever it was that made the new login music I have something to tell you
body: This piece of music is one of the most beautiful things I have ever heard and I thought the Braum theme would always be my favorite but Jhin's is astounding. This music is basically Kreygasm incarnate and whoever made this piece is a musical genius. Seriously this is so beautiful to listen too.

replies.body: Thanks for your kind words, Chespin2013! This was a particularly cool champ to write music for, and I'm glad our efforts aren't going unnoticed :P Thanks for listening!
